item.title: August 31 2012 Live Google Hangout Q&A Session Linus Tech Tips
item.itunes:author: Linus Tech Tips
item.itunes:subtitle: The WAN Show Podcast
item.itunes:summary:
Lots of topics covered tonight. It's over 2 hours long, so don't feel pressured to watch the whole thing :p

Thanks to everyone who tuned in live. The positive feedback is overwhelming so I will definitely continue to do these!

item.title: Linus Tech Tips Live Show Archive - September 14th, 2012
item.itunes:author: Linus Tech Tips
item.itunes:subtitle: The WAN Show Podcast
item.itunes:summary:
Topics: iPhone 5, GTX 660, my kitchen, and general Q&A.

I take questions on Twitter @LinusTech, and I also send out notifications about upcoming live streams on Twitter.

For those of you who follow on YouTube and are concerned you won't be able to watch, I will be posting video notifications to YouTube prior to the live streams, then I will be uploading the completed live streams to YouTube. I haven't forgotten you folks who have supported me all this time!

You can check out future live streams at http://www.twitch.tv/linustech

item.itunes:subtitle: The WAN Show Podcast
item.itunes:summary:
**READ THIS BEFORE WATCHING** Sorry there's a period for about 10 minutes at 1:11 where there's accidentally a video running the background ruining the audio... Just skip it I guess.

Topics: Live Halo 4 unboxing, I'm on Facebook now, Star Citizen crowd funding, picking the perfect power supply, Acer S7 super thin notebook, Core i7 3970X value, and of course Q&A!

I take questions on Twitter @LinusTech, and I also send out notifications about upcoming live streams on Twitter.
